results.content: The instructor is evidently too good! He made lot of tough concepts appear ridiculously simple. Great for understanding the basics and get started.Great teacher and contents. This course is really great. If You need to understand the basis of TODO App it's a must watch course. You will built complex applications. You will get the basis to do it. It helped me a lot and I can apply what I've learnt in real situations.

results.content: Good course material, but pretty fast and most not explained. Be prepared for trial and error and digging into the documentation of the entire stack. That being said if you can make it through that this is a decent template for most other SPAs and can be expanded for your own projects.
